title: How to Make a Simple Death Notebook

steps.headline: Get a journal, any kind, just no ring, a black folder, a glue stick and scissors.
Go online, go to Google Images and type 'Death Note Letters'.
steps.description: It will show you the D/E/A/T/H/N/O/T/E letters. Or you can draw them yourself and cut them out and paste them on the notebook if you want.

steps.headline: Cut the letters out.
steps.description: It does not have to be perfect because the background will be black. Leave the letters somewhere safe.

steps.headline: Get your folder and cut out the pockets.
Cut the folder as the same size as the journal and glue it on top.
Glue the letters together on the cover.

tyn: Permission from your parents (for you kids/teens out there)
text: Get a journal, any kind, just no ring, a black folder, a glue stick and scissors.  Go online, go to Google Images and type 'Death Note Letters'. It will show you the D/E/A/T/H/N/O/T/E letters. Or you can draw them yourself and cut them out and paste them on the notebook if you want. Cut the letters out. It does not have to be perfect because the background will be black. Leave the letters somewhere safe. Get your folder and cut out the pockets.  Cut the folder as the same size as the journal and glue it on top.  Glue the letters together on the cover.  Finished.
sentences: Get a journal, any kind, just no ring, a black folder, a glue stick and scissors.
Go online, go to Google Images and type 'Death Note Letters'.
It will show you the D/E/A/T/H/N/O/T/E letters.
Or you can draw them yourself and cut them out and paste them on the notebook if you want.
It does not have to be perfect because the background will be black.
Get your folder and cut out the pockets.
Cut the folder as the same size as the journal and glue it on top.
Glue the letters together on the cover.
